t: Sedalia Announces Amazon's Expansion in Missouri with New Last-Mile Facility in Thompson Meadows Industrial Park
s: April 30, 2025 - SEDALIA, Mo., April 30, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Amazon is expanding its footprint in Missouri with a new, 65,000-square-foot last-mile facility in Sedalia. It will be built on 15 acres within the Thompson Meadows Industrial Park, a Missouri Certified Site designed for seamless development.
